nodes.text: The Muun officer corps was the officer corps fielded by the InterGalactic Banking Clan, which was founded and led by members of the Muun species. The officer corps was responsible for directing the InterGalactic Banking Clan Collections and Security Division's IG-series battle droid army in order to protect the Bank's foreclosed assets. During the Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems, the corps served as part of the Confederacy's Droid Army.
The Muun officer corps was mentioned in Rise of the Separatists, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
